amendment.description: Amendment creates a permitting process through the Department of Energy, FERC, and Department of State for cross-border infrastructure projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green, Gene amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 263 - 158 (Roll no. 658).

action.text: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Green, Gene.
